Github Repository for this Dynamic Web App

Modern Personal Website This website was made using Jekyll, styled with Sass and scripted with Vanilla Javascript. It's a dynamic multipage web application which incorporates a portfolio section, blog & posts, about and contact page. System Preparation In order to use this project, you'll need the following things installed on your machine.

13 Feb 2018

Welcome to Jekyll!

You'll find this post in your _posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext. Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets: def print_hi(name) puts "Hi, #{name}" end print_hi('Tom') #=> prints 'Hi, Tom'...

11 Nov 2011

America and the Spirit of Volunteerism

Aimeos TYPO3 extension The repository contains the TYPO3 extension integrating the Aimeos e-commerce library into TYPO3. The extension provides plugins for e.g. filter, list and detail views, for searching products as well as baskets and the checkout process.
